2.「おお レーノス ちょうどいいところに。| お前さんと <pc>で 組んで| や: Oh, Renos, I was just thinking... With you.<pc> So, I need you to team up and do a job for|me...

3.「はあっ？ この新米とぉ！？| んなの ユウギリに 任せときゃいいのに……。: Huh? With this newbie? You should've left|that to Eugiri...

4.「先日 ユウギリからの報告で| モリナラ大森林の樹木が 許可なく| 伐採されてい: The other day, Eugiri reported that trees in|the Great Molinaru Forest were being cut down|without permission...

5.「今回の任務は この犯人を見つけだし| 不法な伐採を やめさせることじゃ。| ふ: Our mission is to find this criminal and stop|his illegal logging. Let's work together and|do our best!

6.「……うーくっくっくっ。| 伐採をやめさせるよう がんばっさい！| ……くっくっ: ... Woo-woo... Let's try to stop the logging!|... Uh-uh...

7.「オレひとりで 充分ですって。| こんな新米 連れてったら うまくいくものも|: I'm fine on my own... If I take a newbie like|this, things won't go so well...

8.「ちゅーわけで オレは ひとりで行くからよ。| お前は お前で 好きにしな。: That's why I'm going alone... You like it|when you're you...

9.「なんだ あのレーノスってのは？| いちいち 相棒のことを 半人前あつかいして|: What's with this Renos guy? He's the kind of|guy who pisses off his partner every time he|thinks he's half a man.

10.「おおかた 選ばれし レンジャーである| 相棒に シットしてるんだろうぜ。| ハ: Most of them are chosen rangers, sittin'|around with their partners... Hahan! You|little...

11.「まあまあ スピルどの。| レーノスは あれで 優秀なレンジャー。| 彼なりの考: Well, well, well, Spi... He's a good Ren...|He's got his own agenda, so...

12.「……で レーノスの奴は ああ言っておったが| お前さんは どうする <pc>？: And that's what he said about Renos| What are you gonna do?<pc> Will you accept this assignment? Will you|accept this assignment?

13.「それでは 頼んだぞ。| まずは 先日見つけたという 切り株が| たくさんある場: Okay, so... First, we'll go to a place where|there are a lot of stumps that we found the|other day.

14.「では 頼んだぞ……と思ったら| なんじゃ その 頼まれごとの数は！？: Well, I'm asking you... But then I thought,|what's with all the requests?

15.「それでは 仕事のひとつも 頼めんぞ！| ええい。さっさと 手を空けてくるのじゃ: You can't ask me to do a single thing! ...|Now, get your hands free!

16.「選ばれし レンジャーの任務としては| 役不足というわけか。強気じゃのう。| 部: I'm not sure I'm up to the task of being a|chosen ranger. My men have become Teng. My|men have turned into Teng. Oh, my God, Teng!

17.「……うーくっくっくっ。| テングになって まいっテング！| ……くっくっくっ。: ... Woo-hoo-hoo... I'll be Teng, I'll be|Teng! ... Ugh...

18.「やっぱり お前も 来たのか。| チッ！ オレひとりで 充分だってのに| 足手ま: I knew you'd come too. Damn it! I'm good on|my own, but you're slowing me down...

19.「おうおう だまって聞いてりゃ| さっきから ずいぶんと うちの相棒を| こき下: If you'll just shut up and listen, you've|been putting my partner down quite a bit...

20.<if_woman>「たしかに 相棒は ボンヤリしたとこもあるが| このオレ様が: <if_woman>You're right, my partner may be a little on|the fuzzy side, but I've got to admit... He's|a better ranger than you are.<else>You're right, my partner may be a little on|the fuzzy side, but I've got to admit... He's|a better ranger than you are.<endif>

21.「フン……こいつが ウワサの精霊か。| いい機会だ。ぜひとも その才能ってやつを: Hmm... This is the guy they're talking|about... Good... Let's see if he can prove|his talent...

22.「今から オレは この広大な森の中から| 木を伐採した犯人を 見つけだすからよ。: From now on, I'm going to find out who cut|down the trees in this vast forest. You, on|your own...

23.「それでもし オレよりも先に| 犯人を見つけだすことが できたなら| お前のこと: If you can find the culprit before I do, then|I'll give you credit...

24.「まあ この森は オレにとっちゃ| 庭みてーなもんだ。| やる前から 勝負は見え: Well, this forest is like a garden to me. I|already know what I'm going to do.

25.「こうなりゃ 先に犯人を見つけだして| あいつのハナを 明かしてやろうぜ！| 森: Let's find out who did this before they do|and get to the bottom of it! We'll search the|depths of the forest like the dickens!

26.「こらーっ！| お前ら 何してやがる！！: Hey! What the fuck are you doing?

27.「やべえ！ レンジャー協会だっ！: Oh, no! It's the Ranger Association!

29.「いや。いい機会だ。| 宣戦布告してやろうじゃないか。: No, no, no. Let's... Let's just declare|war...

30.「オレたちは 伐採同盟。| 自らの自由意思で 森を切りひらき| 未来をも 切りひ: We are a logging... We are an organization|that uses our own free will to cut down the|forest and create the future!

31.「なーにが 伐採同盟だ！| ようするに 無法者の集まりじゃねーか！: What's the Logging Alliance? It's just a|bunch of outlaws!

32.「モリナラ大森林の自然を守る| エルトナ・レンジャー協会 モリナラ支部の| <c: Protecting the Nature of the Great Molinarra Forest| The Molinarra Chapter of the Eltona Ranger Association|<cs_pchero>I'll take care of it!

33.「自然を守る……か。笑わせるな！| 森は ヒトの侵入を拒む 危険な領域だ！| そ:
Protecting Nature: .... Don't make me laugh!|The forest is a dangerous territory that|refuses to be invaded by humans! There is no|
|need to protect it!

34.「な なに 勝手なこと言ってやがる！| 森は 地上に生きる すべての生物にとって: What the hell are you talking about? The|forest is an irreplaceable place for all life|on earth!

35.「……しょせん わかりあえないか。| やはり 貴様らとは 戦うしかないようだ。|: ... We can't understand each other. I'll have|to fight you all. Let's go! Let's go! Logging|machine!

37.「……どうする？| 今度こそ ズラかるか？: ... What do we do now? What do we do now?

38.「フン！ | 何度来ようと けちらしてやるだけだ！| さあ 行けっ 伐採マシィィ: Hmph! I don't care how many times they come,|I'm gonna kick their asses! Come on, let's|go! Logging machine!

39.「くそっ！| 伐採同盟の奴ら 相棒が 戦っている間に| とっとと 逃げちまったよ: Damn it! The Logging Alliance got away while|my partner was fighting...

41.「今ごろ やっと ご到着かよ。| オメーが ノロノロしてる間に| 相棒は 犯人を: By now, you've arrived... While you were|slowing down, your partner found the culprit.

42.「なーに チョーシこいてやがる！| お前らが 来たときには オレは とっくに|: What the hell is wrong with you people? By|the time you guys got here, I was already|here, hiding...

44.「連中のアジトをつきとめようと 隠れてたのに| お前が しゃしゃり出てきて 暴れ:
We've been hiding out, trying to find out|where they're hiding, and now you've come out|of the woodwork and gone berserk, and I'm|
|wondering what the hell is going on.

45.「まっ 結局 ヤツらが 逃げだして| 後をつけれたから アジトは判明したけどな。: Well, eventually they got away, and we were|able to follow them, so we figured out where|they were... It's all good.

46.「くっ……。じゃ じゃあ 今すぐ| そのアジトに 突入して| 伐採同盟の連中 と: Damn... Then let's raid that hideout right|now and take out the logging alliance!

47.「……ったく これだから シロートは。| 見たとこ あいつらは かなりの大人数だ: ... That's why they're so white. I mean,|they're pretty big... I can't believe we're|the only ones...

48.「とりあえず アジトの場所を報告して| 後は 支部長の判断に まかせんぞ。| こ:
I'll just report the location of the hideout|and leave the rest to the branch manager's|discretion... This is too much for us to|
|handle...

49.「む～っ。ただの チャラい奴かと思ってたが| なかなか やるじゃねーか。| ……:
I thought you were just a flirt, but... I|thought you were just a flirt, but you're|pretty good... It's... I don't like what|
|you're saying.

50.「しかたねえ。あいつの言うとおり| 今は 支部に戻るとしよーぜ 相棒。: But... Maybe he's right. Maybe we should go|back to the chapter now...

52.「しかし 伐採同盟とはのう……。| そんな同盟と戦うことになるなんて| どう 命: But the Logging Alliance... I don't know how|I'm supposed to fight such an alliance...

53.「……うーくっくっくっ。| 同盟と戦うのを どう命じるか……| くっくっくっ。: ... Ugh... I don't know how to tell you to|fight the Alliance... Ugh...

54.「なんだ よーやく 戻ったのか。| ずいぶん ごゆっくりだったな。: Oh, no. I'm finally back... You're taking|your time.

55.「そうだ 支部長。| 例の任務は こいつに任せちゃどうです？: Well... Why don't we just let him handle the|mission?

56.「……ふーむ そうじゃのう。| ユウギリだと 道に迷いそうじゃし| <pc>が: ... Hmm, yes... I'm afraid we'll get lost in|the woods.<pc> might be the right man for the job.

57.「じゃ そういうことで！| オレは 連中のアジトの| 見張りに 行ってきますよ。: So that's it. I'm going to go keep an eye on|their hideout.

59.「うむ。じつは レーノスの報告から| 伐採同盟を 相手にするのに| この支部だけ:
Hmm. As a matter of fact, based on Renos'|report, I've determined that this branch|alone is insufficient to deal with the|
|logging alliance...

60.「王都カミハルムイの レンジャー本部に| 書状を出して 援軍を頼むことにしたんじ: I've decided to send a letter to the ranger|headquarters in King's Landing, Kamikarmui,|asking for reinforcements...

61.「……で その書状を届ける役目を| <pc>に 頼もうということに| なったわけ: And he was responsible for delivering the letter|<pc> So we've decided to ask...

62.「遠いところ すまんが これを届けるまでを| 今回の任務とさせてもらおう。| よ: I know you're a long way from home, but I'd|like to make this my mission until I get this|to you. I'm counting on you.<pc> ！

64.「なーんか 相棒ってば メンドーな仕事を| 押しつけられたみたいだなぁ。| 悪い: I feel like I'm being forced to do something|annoying for my partner... I'm sorry, but if|you'll let me take a break...

65.「やれやれ スピルどのは 手きびしいな。| だが このままでは いつか 森の怒り: Oh, man. Spill is a handful... But if we|continue like this, one day the forest will|explode in anger. We can't let that happen.
